author: Bengaltiger1

text: @SupraDarky I never really got into RCT3. For me it's always been the original with the expansion packs. As for the song, it's brilliant. Strangely enough I never paid attention to it when I first played the game, I liked Nemesis Quest and such more. If you really like this song with its summer feel you should check out Acoustic Alchemy, a smooth jazz band. Start with the song "Playing for Time", I doubt you'll regret it.

text: I haven't played Roller Coaster Tycoon 3 in years, but this brought back so many damn memories that I couldn't not go back and play it!  And normally a song doesn't make me do that!!!  Really love this damn game so much, so nostalgic.  I know this sounds cheesy but I remember crowding around a computer with the entire family while playing these games.  :)  Anyone else?  Also, thanks for reminding me of a most amazing track.

author: Hawlo

text:
I get really addicted to these kind of games when I play. I bought this game after playing the demo over and over again. Managing rollercoasters is just really fun, I also got addicted to games like Sim Golf or the classic Sim City series. I wonder what's up with the Tycoon series though, it's been a while.

I like this song, definitely has the awesome summer feel. It's finally getting warmer here too, so I guess I'm in the mood.
author: SupraDarky
